ict.title: ICT Introduction Support
ict.body: We support the introduction, operation, and optimization of ICT. In addition to setting and installing computers, we also develop human resources who can handle consulting, after-sales support, and information technology.

system.title: System Development
system.body: We develop and provide systems that meet various needs such as business reforms and medical office work. By making full use of modern technology, it is possible to create a low-cost yet convenient environment.

contents.title: Contents Creation
contents.body: We produce websites and videos that utilize the latest designs and systems. We meet the needs of our customers and provide optimized products for each platform.

management.title: Management
management.body: We provide unprecedented and flexible management services to people who are active in various fields. We will create an environment where you can focus on your creative activities through content production support, schedule management, and information provision.

mission.title: Mission
mission.body: “Novalumo” is the international auxiliary word Esperanto, which means “New Light”. This word contains the desire to “give light to the world and make people smile.” Our mission is to bring courage, hope, and smiles to many people through information and communication technology, and entertainment.
